name: Bearvarchy
description:
AD to move left/right SPACE to interact.

In Bearavchy Katmis is trying to get her applications for a box sitting approved at the Federal United Bureaucracy of the Animal Republic, or FUBAR for short. FUBAR is your typical well-oiled municipality well at work where everything runs like an elephant in a china shop. Your goal is to get your applications approved before dying of old age or exploding in a fit of rage. Each task is different from the next, it might or might not make sense to your tiny mind, but rest assured the top-notch employees at FUBAR will go’ to any length to help push your application problem onto someone else.
